name: TPOC: last life
description:
A game originally made but  development has stopped by itsmedevroland, CHECK HIS ITCH.IO PROFILE OUT!

---------TPOC--------

TPOC stands for "the power of creation", the game was originally made by itsmedevroland in construct but the development was stopped. So i said to myself, why not continue it? and here is the last life version of TPOC made by me in Gdevelop5 and all assets came from Rolands sprite jumbo pack(check it out!).

------Controls-------

wasd - movement

space - attack/use item

f1 - screenshot

1 - hand

2 - *locked*

3 - torch

4 - bow (if u have a bow/arrow)

-----BEWARE------

reapers come in packs(2-6) at afternoons and nights! make sure to craft a bow!

And a lot, by that i mean A LOT of arrows

-----Updates--------

if this game gets 50+ veiws and 10+ plays in the browser i will add a boss, new loot, slimes, and a new biome!

Hope u like it :)

   -Kreepe
